import { useContext, useState } from "react" import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { Accordion, Button, Form, Icon } from "semantic-ui-react"; import { GlobalContext } from "../../../contexts/globalContext" export type UsernameChangeFormValues = { username: string, confirmusername: string; } export type PasswordChangeFormValues = { oldpassword: string, password: string, confirmpassword: string; } type FormHandles = { usernameHandler: (formValues: UsernameChangeFormValues) => void, passwordHandler: (formValues: PasswordChangeFormValues) => void; pfpHandler: (formValues: PFPChangeFormValues) => void; } export function Account({ usernameHandler, passwordHandler, pfpHandler }: FormHandles) { const [state, setState] = useState(-1); const handleClick = (e: any, titleProps: any) => { const { index } = titleProps const activeIndex = state const newIndex = activeIndex === index ? -1 : index setState(newIndex) } const user = useContext(GlobalContext).state.user; const { handleSubmit, register } = useForm(); return (

{user?.username}{user?.username.substring(user?.username.length - 1) === "s" ? "'" : "'s"} Account

Change Profile Picture
Change Username
Change Password
Change Profile Picture
) }
